alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 4:56AM PST until January 05 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING HAS BEEN REPLACED BY A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WHICH IS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow, occasionally mixed with sleet or freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Washington, Central Columbia River Gorge. In Oregon, Upper Hood River Valley and Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...Until midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult due to snow and ice.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley
